channel.title: CRI on 为人民服务
channel.description: Recent content in CRI on 为人民服务

item.title: Docker_macvlan
item.description: 准备 需要4.0以上的内核 uname -r 4.15.0-45-generic 加载macvlan sudo modprobe macvlan lsmod | grep macvlan ... macvlan 24576 0 ... 创建macvlan ip addr show enp0s3 enp0s3: <BROADCAST,MULTICAST,UP,LOWER_UP> mtu 1500 qdisc pfifo_fast state UNKNOWN group default qlen 1000 link/ether 08:00:27:c0:91:4c brd ff:ff:ff:ff:ff:ff inet 192.168.1.10/24 ip route default via 192.168.1.1 dev enp0s3 onlink docker network create -d macvlan \ --subnet=192.168.1.0/24 \ --ip-range=192.168.1.128/25 \ --gateway=192.168.1.1 \ -o parent=enp0s3 macLan docker run --rm -itd --network macLan --name web nginx:1.
